3: The tearful red cube disappears in the distance.
Is it going to be okay?
Liv watches it go away, looking worried.
Nian won't attack it, so don't worry.
Besides, we were also holding back. It didn't suffer real damage.
There's no much time left. Let's go back first.
More red packets are tossed into the bonfire and turned into colorful bubbles that float in the air, lighting up the surrounding darkness temporarily.
This should buy us enough vision.
These bubbles can only give us light for the night. Even the bonfire may go out sometimes.
We must eliminate Nian once and for all to take our day back.
